architecture_decision.rationale: DD disk images cause hardware-specific failures (ESP timeouts, firmware mismatches). nixos-install from flake works on any x86_64 hardware.
key_files: iso/appliance-image.nix (installer ISO with dialog TUI + msp-auto-install)

overlay_flow: 1. Insert update_agent order with tarball URL
4. _apply_overlay() detects overlay, purges modules, re-imports from overlay
5. Agent runs with overlay code (new handlers, fixes, etc.)
NOTE: Pre-fix appliances use argparse.py bootstrap shim to activate overlay
rebuild_flow: 2. Agent runs nixos-rebuild test via systemd-run (escapes ProtectSystem sandbox)
3. New system activates, agent restarts with new nix code
5. Watchdog timer persists rebuild with nixos-rebuild switch
6. If agent fails to check in within 10 min, watchdog rolls back
fleet_update_mechanism.key_insight: NixOS buildPythonApplication wrappers override PYTHONPATH, making os.execve useless for overlay activation. Fix: purge sys.modules + update __path__ within same process. Pre-fix bootstrap: fake argparse.py intercepts first import in main().

active_tasks.task: Rotate leaked credentials from old settings.local.json
active_tasks.note: Anthropic API key, AWS access keys, bearer tokens were in permission strings. Still in shell history
rm -rf running on VPS (PID 3841089) against /mnt/storagebox. Slow due to network-mounted CIFS. Will finish on its own
78,699 expired proofs can't be upgraded (calendar pruned). Need batch job to re-submit hashes for fresh calendar commitments

active_tasks.task: Fix Bitcoin block height extraction in OTS
active_tasks.note: Fixed: replaced fixed 4-byte int with read_bitcoin_varint(). Commit e60bdfa

active_tasks.task: Fix rebuild order completion on agent restart
active_tasks.note: Persists order_id to /var/lib/msp/.pending-rebuild-order before rebuild. Completes on first successful checkin after restart. Commit 9e3d408.
Added 'healing' to dispatch dict + _handle_healing() routes through _execute_healing_action() with run_runbook:<ID> format. Commit 9e3d408.

active_tasks.task: Remove argparse bootstrap shim after nix rebuild
active_tasks.note: After both appliances have the fixed _apply_overlay() from nix rebuild, the argparse.py bootstrap in the overlay tarball is no longer needed. Can be removed from future tarballs.

completed_this_session: Fixed Dashboard all-zeros + Learning Loop 500 errors: root cause was asyncio.gather() on same AsyncSession (InvalidStateError). Fixed 3 files (routes.py 2x, portal.py 1x). db_queries.py was already fixed locally. Deployed all to VPS
Fixed CI: Build VirtualBox VM workflow failing on assertion — test-client-wired.nix had http:// placeholder for mcpUrl (module requires HTTPS for non-localhost). Changed to https://. Commit 881bd8a

Enriched L3 escalation emails: email_alerts.py send_critical_alert() now accepts and renders host_id, severity, check_type, drift details (expected vs actual table), HIPAA controls with descriptions, attempted remediation actions, recommended action. main.py passes all incident data to email. escalation_engine.py added ntp_sync/time to HIPAA control map and suggestions. Deployed to VPS

recent_commits.message: fix: Use HTTPS in test-client-wired mcpUrl placeholder to pass module assertion
quality: Phase 6 — stale doc versions + gRPC TLS support
docs: Language audit — replace enforcement/autonomous with attestation/evidence substrate
quality: Phase 5 code quality - constants, platform detection, error standardization
fix: OTS varint parsing, batch resubmission endpoint, all backend tests passing

key_findings.evidence_pipeline_status: 182,685 bundles in DB (111K physical, 71K test). Feb bundles all Ed25519 signed (2,408 signed). Hash chain 111K+ positions deep. Agent submits JSON to /api/evidence/sites/{site_id}/submit with Ed25519 signature + signed_data
key_findings.minio_worm_status: evidence-worm-v2 bucket with COMPLIANCE 90d Object Lock. WORM uploads active (verified latest bundle in MinIO). Transient Docker DNS issue resolved after container restart
key_findings.compliance_packet_data: Real HIPAA compliance packets LIVE at /api/evidence/sites/{site_id}/compliance-packet. Jan: 28.3% (109K bundles, early setup). Feb: 52.1% (2.4K bundles, all signed, 2.2K BTC-anchored). 15 check types mapped to HIPAA controls. MTTR 0.3-0.5h
key_findings.ots_status: 2,705 anchored to Bitcoin, 251 pending, 78,699 expired. Fixed construct_ots_file (missing version byte). Uses opentimestamps-client reference library. Upgrade loop: 15min/500 batch
key_findings.nix_overlay_lesson: NixOS buildPythonApplication creates bash wrappers that override PYTHONPATH. os.execve re-runs the wrapper, losing the overlay. Fix: manipulate __path__ and sys.modules within the same process. For pre-fix appliances, hijack an import (argparse.py shim) to bootstrap the overlay.
key_findings.systemd_sandbox_lesson: ProtectSystem=strict makes filesystem read-only. nixos-rebuild needs /nix/store write access. Use systemd-run --wait --pipe to escape the sandbox into an unsandboxed transient unit.
key_findings.deployment_lesson: ALWAYS push to main instead of manual scp. CI/CD workflow (.github/workflows/deploy-central-command.yml) auto-deploys backend + frontend to VPS on push to main when mcp-server/central-command/** changes. Manual scp causes stale versions. Pipeline: checkout -> npm ci -> npm run build -> rsync backend to /opt/mcp-server/dashboard_api_mount/ -> rsync frontend to /opt/mcp-server/frontend_dist/ -> docker compose restart.
key_findings.learning_loop_stats_lesson: Promotion history must match execution_telemetry by incident_type + hostname/site_id (from pattern_signature), NOT by runbook_id. Agent records executions with internal IDs (L1-SVC-DNS-001) that differ from promoted_to_rule_id (RB-AUTO-SERVICE_). The pattern_signature format is check_type:check_type:target where target is hostname or site_id.
key_findings.dashboard_asyncio_lesson: SQLAlchemy AsyncSession cannot run concurrent queries via asyncio.gather(). Causes InvalidStateError. Must run queries sequentially on the same session. Fixed in db_queries.py, routes.py (2x), portal.py (1x). All deployed to VPS.
key_findings.l3_email_lesson: L3 escalation emails are generated in email_alerts.py send_critical_alert(), called from main.py POST /incidents handler. The escalation_engine.py path (via notifications.py /api/escalations) is separate — used when agent posts to Central Command directly. Both paths now have rich context.

deployment_flow: 1. Build installer ISO on VPS: nix build .#appliance-iso
2. Write to USB: dd if=result/iso/*.iso of=/dev/diskN bs=4m
4. msp-auto-install runs: dialog TUI with 8-step progress
6. Central Command provisions via MAC address

fleet_update_commands.deploy_overlay: INSERT INTO admin_orders (order_id, appliance_id, site_id, order_type, parameters, status, expires_at) VALUES ('overlay-ID', 'APPLIANCE_ID', 'SITE_ID', 'update_agent', '{"package_url": "https://api.osiriscare.net/agent-packages/compliance-agent-1.0.56.tar.gz", "version": "1.0.56-desc"}', 'pending', now() + interval '2 hours')
fleet_update_commands.trigger_rebuild: INSERT INTO admin_orders (order_id, appliance_id, site_id, order_type, parameters, status, expires_at) VALUES ('rebuild-ID', 'APPLIANCE_ID', 'SITE_ID', 'nixos_rebuild', '{"flake_ref": "github:jbouey/msp-flake#osiriscare-appliance-disk"}', 'pending', now() + interval '4 hours')
fleet_update_commands.run_diagnostic: INSERT INTO admin_orders (order_id, appliance_id, site_id, order_type, parameters, status, expires_at) VALUES ('diag-ID', 'APPLIANCE_ID', 'SITE_ID', 'diagnostic', '{"command": "agent_status"}', 'pending', now() + interval '1 hour')

quick_commands.appliance_status: ssh root@178.156.162.116 "docker exec mcp-postgres psql -U mcp -d mcp -c 'SELECT site_id, agent_version, last_checkin FROM appliances ORDER BY last_checkin DESC'"
